column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The food here was absolutely delicious! Although the nutella  waffles weren't anything special
column2: you need to try the Citrus french toast! We were all a bit hesitant to try it because of the unfamiliarity behind the concept. Once we did try it though
column3: we were hooked! It was perfectly sweet from the honey and savory from the goat cheese
column4: yet still had a hint of citrus to it. One thing to note. There are a lot of nice tables in this restaurant  for brunch but there is a spot that is dark and dingy and not ideal. Because we didn't specify
column5: we were taken to the back dark area. Make sure to tell them you want a seat in an area with natural lighting. They have plenty of it!!
